messages.title: It's Bridget or Labour
messages.content: As the election battle in our area hots up, local people are set to choose between local champion Bridget Fox and Gordon Brown's Labour MP.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Liberal Democrats propose to freeze Council Tax while Labour's management has resulted in it being the highest in London.

mentions.tacticalSituation: As a two-horse race, it's suggested that voting for Conservatives will only help Labour hold on.

issues.health: Bridget Fox criticizes Labour's management of the local hospital's A&E.
issues.socialWelfare: Bridget Fox emphasizes the need for energy companies to fund insulation for pensioners and to cut energy bills.

housing.content: Liberal Democrats propose to freeze Council Tax which was the highest in London under Labour, impacting already struggling local residents.

quotes.text: Labour should hang their heads in shame over energy bills than thousands of our poorest residents are struggling with.

images.caption: Lib Dem Bridget Fox bookies' favourite to be our next MP.
